author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-American Express Canada Says Reached Agreement With Aimia And Air Canada To Extend Agreement To Remain Payments Card Partner
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - American Express Canada :
* AMERICAN EXPRESS CANADA - REACHED AGREEMENT WITH AIMIA AND AIR CANADA TO EXTEND AGREEMENT TO REMAIN PAYMENTS CARD PARTNER IN AEROPLAN REWARDS PROGRAM
* AMERICAN EXPRESS CANADA - RENEWED CONTRACT EXTENDS THROUGH TO JUNE 29, 2020, TO BE COTERMINOUS WITH AIR CANADA’S PARTICIPATION IN AEROPLAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
